amendment.description: To facilitate the transition from military schools to civilian schools of dependents of members of the Armed Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4381 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4381 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Chambliss. (consideration: CR S6377-6392) To facilitate the transition from military schools to civilian schools of dependents of members of the Armed Forces.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4381 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4381 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Chambliss.
